column3: @jonasschnelli Let me know if I got the banlist stuff right...\n
ACK!\nThanks @sdaftuar for the banlist part! It short and perfect.\n
re-ACK 65d384f. I appreciate that this is addressing my concern from #7391. (Expose the option to non-miners)\n

utACK https://github.com/sdaftuar/bitcoin/commit/65d384fe82fcfbe060f1c4884572cf9439c9f840

I'll do a separate pull-req for it, but I think the release notes need to make clear that opt-in or not, unconfirmed transactions are easy to replace. (see https://petertodd.org/2016/are-wallets-ready-for-rbf)
Oops, thanks for catching, will fix.\n
